alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Livingston; Northwest St. Tammany; Southern Tangipahoa; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 6:02PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, northeastern St. James, northern St. Charles, northwestern St. Tammany, southeastern Livingston and southern Tangipahoa Parishes through 700 PM CST... At 602 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Natalbany to near Springfield to 7 miles south of Whitehall. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Covington, Reserve, Laplace, Ponchatoula, Madisonville, Folsom, Springfield, Natalbany, Robert, Garyville, Killian and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 189 and 214. Interstate 12 between mile markers 36 and 64. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Livingston; Northwest St. Tammany; Southern Tangipahoa; St. James; St. John The Baptist
